A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is what happens when you disregard your fanbase and focus more on social political agenda rather than great coherent and logical storytelling. Kylo wasn't joking when he said out with the old in with the new\, this film is Disney's manifesto put to screen as a declaration to all old fans that they no longer are the focus or concern when it comes to the Star Wars franchise. On the plus side it is beautiful to look at with a great performance by Mark Hamill even if he was playing Jake Skywalker...
